reviews.review: This has to be my favorite episode of all the Half-Life 2 episodes.
Its a legendary game i think you should try it.

Excelente jogos 
uma das melhores franquias de games da historia, se ainda não jogou recomendo muito que jogue todos.
Episode 3'ü torunlarım oynar artık uruspu çucu

This is another excellent entry in the Half-Life series that I've been replaying as a lead-up to Half-Life: Alyx.  Episode Two is every bit as good as the main game and Episode One.  While another short experience (perhaps a little longer than Episode One), Valve still provides an exciting action-packed experience with a memorable ending.

About that ending... the plot of Episode Two actually is resolved, but as a lead-in to Episode Three it ends with a shocking, emotional cliffhanger.  This game was released in 2007, after which players anxiously awaited Episode Three and the conclusion of the story. As of 2020, we are still waiting.  We can only hope that Valve will one day resolve this story. For years, the silence from Valve was deafening.  In 2017, ten years after this game was released, Mark Laidlaw (writer for Half-Life) published "Epistle 3" on the internet, which many have assumed to be the story for Episode Three.  Modders are taking that story and making it into a game, but that will no doubt be many years in the making.  In the meantime, Valve has released Half-Life: Alyx, a VR-only prequel to Half-Life 2.  I look forward to playing that next.
Все слова здесь излишни, это шедевр!
realmente es un juego clasico de Valve, tiene un grandiosa historia y jugabilidad... lo recomiendo demasiado y le dare un 11/10

even in death, gabe newell manages to fuck me. how dare that brony cunt add another achievement, taking away my hard-earned 100%. i spent hours toting that little fucking gnome around, save-scumming my way through the strider fight and finding every last little fucking grub in that FUCKING cave. now i cant claim 100% completion until that fat retard goes through with his bullshit publicity stunt, fuck valve, fuck gabe newell, fuck my life.
edit: all is forgiven, still fuck him and his antics though
